charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to commit mail, wire, and bank fraud(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 1s: Bureau of Prisons - 42 months - Supervised Release - 5 years with special conditions imposed - Special Assessment - $100.00 due in full immediately - Restitution - $1,612,612.94 due in full immediately - Joint and Several - Interest Waived. Recommendations by the Court: Place of incarceration at the Federal Correctional Institution in Butner, NC. Allowed to self-report as directed.
